participant_1.background:
I've never told my parents about the time I stole a car.
i still live with my parents.
my favorite band used to be toto.
i do not like music.
My hair is a vibrant shade of purple, which is perfect for my personality and my sense of style.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I collect memories and seashells from my travels.
i love 80s music.
I want to be more patient with my partner.
i enjoy cooking for people.

content.text: My name is Erin, what's yours?
My name is Max. I like your hair color!
Thanks, I like it too. It's a vibrant shade of purple.
It's really unique. I like it. Do you have any other interesting hobbies or interests?
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots. I collect memories and seashells from my travels.
That's really cool! I'm not very good at traveling, so I mostly stay close to home. I like to cook for people and I love 80s music.
Oh, I want to be more patient with my partner. I love cooking for people too!
We have a lot in common! Do you have any favorite recipes?
I love making pasta dishes. I like making homemade pasta and sauces.
That sounds delicious! I could eat pasta everyday.
Me too! We should have a pasta dinner sometime!
That sounds like a great idea! I'd love to meet up with you and cook some pasta together.
